name: Space Grapple (Cosmic Origin)
description:
Fling your way through three levels, each taking place on vastly different planets orbiting the black hole. Explore  the remnants of an ancient civilization, in search of an answer to save your ship and passengers.

The grapple gun was constructed thousands of years ago by an extinct civilization. It allows the user to shoot a tractor beam at grapple cubes to pull the user towards them.

You will discover many secrets as you explore. Only you can find out what destroyed a civilization so advanced.

Explore the planets and conquer the challenges that lie ahead.

The game is free. Why not download it?
